titles.title: You've Got To Hear Me To Know Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My people won't you listen, I have given you
Ears to hear the truth, for the time of truth is here.
Have patience and don't weaken; all creation is yours
This way to Zion, you listen and you hear.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You've got to hear me to know me. Know me to love me
Love me to live it out my way.
You've got to live it to walk it. Walk it to give it.
Give it to have it on that day.
